Table of Contents

Name

im_rint - for each pixel, find the nearest integral value

Synopsis

#include <vips/vips.h>

int im_rint( in, out )
IMAGE *in, *out;

Description

im_rint(3) finds the nearest integral value. Copy for integer types, call rint(3) for float and complex types. Output type == input type.

Return Value

The function returns 0 on success and -1 on error.

See Also

im_abs(3) , im_clip2fmt(3) , im_floor(3)
